com.danielly.jsf.cinema.services.admin

Class PricesAdmin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danielly.jsf.cinema.services.admin.PricesAdmin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named(value="price_data")
 @RequestScoped
public class PricesAdmin
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class PricesAdmin provides methods to manage the prices in the GUI interface. It handle the inputs, query the database and notify the user when needed.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
